Package at.technikum.springrestbackend.controller

Klasse QuizController

java.lang.Object
at.technikum.springrestbackend.controller.Controller
at.technikum.springrestbackend.controller.QuizController
@Component @RequestMapping("/api/quizzes") @Validated public class QuizController extends Controller
REST Controller for managing quizzes.

    • updateQuizStartDateAndDuration

      @PutMapping("/{id}/startDate/{startDate}/duration/{duration}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuizDTO> updateQuizStartDateAndDuration(@PathVariable @Max(9223372036854775807L) @Min(-9223372036854775808L) @Max(9223372036854775807L) @Min(-9223372036854775808L) Long id, @PathVariable String startDate, @PathVariable int duration)
      Endpoint to update the start date and duration of a quiz.
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the quiz.
      startDate - The new start date.
      duration - The new duration.
      Gibt zurück:
      A ResponseEntity containing the updated quiz if successful, or a "not found" response.
